parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: Flume Client ID
parameter.description: Visit Flume cloud portal to get client ID

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.label: Flume Client Secret
parameter.description: Visit Flume cloud portal to get client secret

parameter.name: refreshIntervalInstanteous
parameter.label: Instantaneous Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Minutes between fetching current flow rate from the cloud service (total cloud fetches is rate-limited to 120/hour)

parameter.name: refreshIntervalCumulative
parameter.label: Cumulative Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Minutes between fetching cumulative usage from the cloud service (total cloud fetches is rate-limited to 120/hour)
